title: 108_hr3767
content: The Act titled "Medicare Prescription Drug Savings and Choice Act of 2004" establishes a Medicare operated prescription drug plan option under the Social Security Act. The Act establishes a Medicare operated prescription drug plan option with nationwide coverage. The Secretary will negotiate with pharmaceutical manufacturers to reduce drug costs for eligible individuals. Strategies will be implemented to promote the use of more affordable alternatives. The Medicare operated prescription drug plan offers nationwide coverage with a uniform monthly beneficiary premium. The Secretary will negotiate drug costs with manufacturers to reduce expenses for eligible individuals. Strategies will be implemented to promote affordable alternatives. The Medicare operated prescription drug plan offers uniform nationwide coverage with a monthly premium of $35 in 2006, adjusted in succeeding years based on costs. The Secretary may adjust premiums for plans offering supplemental coverage. At least one plan must have a $35 premium in 2006. Conforming amendments are made to the Social Security Act. The Medicare operated prescription drug plan offers nationwide coverage with a $35 monthly premium in 2006, adjusted annually. Amendments are made to the Social Security Act to accommodate the plan. Amendments are made to the Social Security Act to designate the Medicare operated prescription drug plan as a fallback plan in certain service areas. Amendments to the Social Security Act designate the Medicare operated prescription drug plan as a fallback plan in specific service areas, with various amendments made to different sections of the Act to include provisions for Medicare operated prescription drug plans. These amendments will take effect as if included in the enactment of the Medicare section. The Medicare operated prescription drug plan is defined in section 1860D-11A(c). The amendments made by this section will take effect as if included in the enactment of the Medicare Prescription Drug, Improvement, and Modernization Act of 2003.
